post_info.post_title: You folks still chasing each others tail?

jitobear

Well I have been in that place and I am glad that I dealt with those who are pro-choice and did not categorize everything in my life outside of my immenant death as "convenience". Plus they actually let me make a decision for myself rather than make it for me. Whacky I am - wanting to manage my own life - being a capable, thinking grown up and all. 
 
 With their help I was able to make the right choices for me and my son.
 
 Way prefered it to a woman hating woman trivializing woman caging can't mind my their own business and must control everyone else's personal life peice of XXXX.

 I've been trying to think of something to say here for about half an hour, but I don't think I can. There is a sort of near zenlike perfection to the sheer idiocy of it. 
 
 We have the smiley, the random insults, the failure to understand the words being used, as well as a misunderstanding of their own logic. Yet without any typos or creative punctuation that might indicate it is the work of one of infinite monkeys rewriting Hamlet, or some sort of caricature.
 
 This post is like almost everything wrong here, incarnate.
